title: Not Yet
abstract: Insecurity is very common among everybody around the world in this modern age. Especially academic pressures and parenting expectation that affect children’s distress (fear of failure). Many people find themselves not as good as their peers whom might have skills or abilities they don’t. This project Focuses on the bias and would like to remind everyone that each individual is uniquely talented and special. For everyone to stop comparing themselves with others and be grateful for who they are. By implementing it and conveying the message through a short 3D animation.
creators: DAVID CAHYA KUSUMA; ELISA ADRIANA; VINCENT WELLEM RUDOLF SAHERTIAN
contributors: Hong-Sik Pak (Advisor 1); Balgum Song (Advisor and Examination Committee)
source: Audio Visual dan Animasi No. 00170032/IDM/2021; David Cahya Kusuma (E12170088)Elisa Adriana (E12170032)Vincent Wellem Rudolf Sahertian (E12170041)
